issue.title: [R] AWS SSO for R package
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17922](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17922). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We'd like to use the arrow library to access datasets in AWS S3 but we are required to use SSO credentials, which don't work with the arrow R package–there is [a similar issue for Python](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14342) but we wanted to flag that this is also an issue with R
